fields.summary: Login page crashes without credentials
fields.steps: Open login page and click 'Login' without entering credentials.
fields.expected_result: Error message prompting for credentials.
fields.actual_result: Application throws an exception and crashes.

fields.summary: Dashboard widgets overlap on small screens
fields.steps: Login and view dashboard on a mobile device.
fields.expected_result: Widgets adjust to screen size.
fields.actual_result: Widgets overlap and are unreadable.

fields.summary: Data not saved to database
fields.steps: Submit new user profile information.
fields.expected_result: Data is saved and confirmation is displayed.
fields.actual_result: No confirmation, data not saved.

fields.summary: Missing error message for incorrect password
fields.steps: Enter an incorrect password on the login page.
fields.expected_result: An error message should be displayed.
fields.actual_result: No error message appears.

fields.summary: User profile page loads slowly
fields.steps: Navigate to the user profile page after login.
fields.expected_result: Page loads quickly.
fields.actual_result: Page takes more than 10 seconds to load.

fields.summary: Database query times out
fields.steps: Run a report that retrieves data from the database.
fields.expected_result: Report loads within 5 seconds.
fields.actual_result: Report times out after 30 seconds.

fields.summary: Missing text labels in navigation bar
fields.steps: Navigate to the main page.
fields.expected_result: All buttons should have visible text labels.
fields.actual_result: Some buttons are missing text labels.

fields.summary: Password reset email not received
fields.steps: Request a password reset email.
fields.expected_result: Password reset email should be received within 5 minutes.
fields.actual_result: No email received after 10 minutes.

fields.summary: Form submission validation error not shown
fields.steps: Submit a form with empty required fields.
fields.expected_result: Validation error should be displayed for missing fields.
fields.actual_result: No validation error displayed.

fields.summary: Content not displayed on homepage
fields.steps: Navigate to the homepage.
fields.expected_result: Content should be displayed correctly.
fields.actual_result: Content does not load or is missing.

fields.summary: Session timeout too short
fields.steps: Stay logged in for 15 minutes without activity.
fields.expected_result: Session should last at least 30 minutes.
fields.actual_result: Session expires after 10 minutes of inactivity.

fields.summary: Broken image link in footer
fields.steps: Scroll to the footer of the page.
fields.expected_result: Footer images should load correctly.
fields.actual_result: One of the images does not load and shows a broken link.

fields.summary: Data export generates incorrect file format
fields.steps: Export data as CSV.
fields.expected_result: File should be saved as a valid CSV format.
fields.actual_result: File is saved as a corrupt format, not opening in Excel.

fields.summary: Search bar does not return results
fields.steps: Search for an existing user.
fields.expected_result: The correct user should appear in the search results.
fields.actual_result: Search returns no results, even though user exists.

fields.summary: Text input field allows invalid characters
fields.steps: Try entering special characters in the username field.
fields.expected_result: Only valid alphanumeric characters should be allowed.
fields.actual_result: Special characters like '@' and '#' are accepted.

fields.summary: Text input field allows invalid characters
fields.steps: Try entering special characters in the username field.
fields.expected_result: Only valid alphanumeric characters should be allowed.
fields.actual_result: Special characters like '@' and '#' are accepted.

fields.summary: Button clicks not responding after modal closure
fields.steps: Open modal, click a button inside it, then close the modal.
fields.expected_result: The button should still respond to clicks after closing the modal.
fields.actual_result: Button becomes unresponsive after the modal is closed.

fields.summary: Dropdown menu items not aligned correctly
fields.steps: Click on a dropdown menu to open it.
fields.expected_result: Menu items should be aligned evenly.
fields.actual_result: Menu items are misaligned and appear jumbled.

fields.summary: File upload validation error not triggered
fields.steps: Attempt to upload a non-image file to the profile image uploader.
fields.expected_result: An error message should appear, indicating that the file is not a valid image.
fields.actual_result: The file uploads without validation, resulting in a broken image on the profile.

fields.summary: API returns incorrect data format
fields.steps: Call the user profile API endpoint.
fields.expected_result: The response should be in JSON format with the correct keys.
fields.actual_result: The API returns XML instead of JSON, causing issues with data parsing.

fields.summary: Broken link in the terms and conditions page
fields.steps: Navigate to the 'Terms and Conditions' link in the footer.
fields.expected_result: The link should open the terms and conditions page.
fields.actual_result: The link leads to a 404 error page.

fields.summary: Overlapping text in footer section
fields.steps: Scroll to the footer on a desktop browser.
fields.expected_result: Text should be clear and non-overlapping.
fields.actual_result: Text in the footer overlaps and is unreadable.

fields.summary: Multiple form submission causes error
fields.steps: Submit the form multiple times in quick succession.
fields.expected_result: Form submission should be handled gracefully.
fields.actual_result: Multiple submissions cause a server error due to duplicate entries.

fields.summary: Application crashes on logout
fields.steps: Log in and then click the logout button.
fields.expected_result: User should be logged out and redirected to the login page.
fields.actual_result: Application crashes and requires a restart.

fields.summary: Incorrect password hint displayed
fields.steps: Click on the 'Forgot Password' link.
fields.expected_result: Password hint should provide a secure hint.
fields.actual_result: Password hint reveals too much information, compromising security.

fields.summary: App fails to detect inactive session
fields.steps: Leave the session idle for 20 minutes.
fields.expected_result: Session should time out after a set period of inactivity.
fields.actual_result: Session remains active, allowing unauthorized access.

fields.summary: Search results display outdated content
fields.steps: Search for an item that was recently updated.
fields.expected_result: The most recent content should appear first in the results.
fields.actual_result: Outdated content is displayed, ignoring the latest updates.

fields.summary: Calendar view displays wrong dates
fields.steps: View the calendar for the current month.
fields.expected_result: The calendar should display the correct dates for the current month.
fields.actual_result: Dates are off by one day, causing confusion.

fields.summary: Text input not responsive on touch devices
fields.steps: Try typing in a text input field on a touch device.
fields.expected_result: Text input should respond correctly to touch events.
fields.actual_result: The input field is unresponsive to touch typing on mobile devices.

fields.summary: Login button disappears on page load
fields.steps: Load the login page.
fields.expected_result: Login button should appear and remain visible.
fields.actual_result: The login button disappears after the page has finished loading.

fields.summary: Navigation menu freezes when hovering over options
fields.steps: Hover over any item in the navigation menu.
fields.expected_result: Menu options should remain responsive.
fields.actual_result: The menu freezes and doesn't respond to further actions.

fields.summary: Home page loads incorrectly on mobile devices
fields.steps: Visit the home page on a mobile device.
fields.expected_result: Page should load correctly with a mobile-friendly layout.
fields.actual_result: The page elements are misaligned, causing a poor user experience.

fields.summary: JavaScript error when submitting the contact form
fields.steps: Fill out the contact form and submit it.
fields.expected_result: Form should submit without errors.
fields.actual_result: A JavaScript error occurs, preventing the form from being submitted.

fields.summary: Password reset email not sent
fields.steps: Request a password reset from the login page.
fields.expected_result: A password reset email should be sent.
fields.actual_result: No email is received despite submitting the request.

fields.summary: Profile picture not updating after upload
fields.steps: Upload a new profile picture from the settings page.
fields.expected_result: The profile picture should update immediately.
fields.actual_result: The old profile picture remains after the upload.

fields.summary: Incorrect user role permissions after login
fields.steps: Log in as a user with restricted access rights.
fields.expected_result: The user should only see permitted sections.
fields.actual_result: The user is able to access restricted areas of the application.

fields.summary: Slow page load times on product listings
fields.steps: Browse the product listings page.
fields.expected_result: Page should load within 2 seconds.
fields.actual_result: Page takes more than 10 seconds to load, causing user frustration.

fields.summary: Multiple login attempts lead to server crash
fields.steps: Attempt to log in multiple times with incorrect credentials.
fields.expected_result: The login system should prevent multiple failed attempts.
fields.actual_result: Server crashes after too many failed login attempts.

fields.summary: Error message not displayed for invalid email format
fields.steps: Enter an invalid email format in the registration form.
fields.expected_result: An error message should appear indicating an invalid email format.
fields.actual_result: No error message is displayed, and the form is submitted with an invalid email.

fields.summary: Broken pagination on the product listings page
fields.steps: Navigate to the last page of product listings.
fields.expected_result: Pagination should allow navigation between pages.
fields.actual_result: The pagination is stuck on the first page.

fields.summary: Overlapping content on the homepage slider
fields.steps: Visit the homepage and view the slider section.
fields.expected_result: The content in the slider should be well spaced and not overlap.
fields.actual_result: Text and images overlap in the slider, affecting readability.

fields.summary: Currency symbol missing in checkout page
fields.steps: Proceed to the checkout page after adding items to the cart.
fields.expected_result: Currency symbol should be displayed next to item prices.
fields.actual_result: The currency symbol is missing, showing only the numeric value.

fields.summary: Error message displayed for valid form submission
fields.steps: Submit the form with valid data.
fields.expected_result: The form should submit without any errors.
fields.actual_result: An error message is shown even though the form is filled out correctly.

fields.summary: Non-functional links in the FAQ section
fields.steps: Click on any link in the FAQ section.
fields.expected_result: Each link should open the corresponding FAQ topic.
fields.actual_result: All the links in the FAQ section are broken and lead to 404 errors.

fields.summary: Video player fails to load content on slow networks
fields.steps: Attempt to play a video on a slow network connection.
fields.expected_result: The video player should buffer and allow playback on slow connections.
fields.actual_result: The video player fails to load content on slow networks, showing a loading error.

fields.summary: Form field validation fails for numeric input
fields.steps: Enter text in a numeric-only field in the form.
fields.expected_result: An error should be shown indicating that the input is invalid.
fields.actual_result: The form is submitted without validation and causes backend errors.

fields.summary: Cart is not updating after adding items
fields.steps: Add items to the shopping cart and check the cart total.
fields.expected_result: Cart total should update with the new items added.
fields.actual_result: The cart total remains the same even after adding items.

fields.summary: Inconsistent font sizes across pages
fields.steps: Browse through various pages in the application.
fields.expected_result: Font sizes should be consistent across all pages.
fields.actual_result: Font sizes vary drastically, making the application look unprofessional.

fields.summary: Logout button does not respond
fields.steps: Click the logout button from the user menu.
fields.expected_result: User should be logged out and redirected to the login page.
fields.actual_result: Clicking the logout button has no effect.

fields.summary: Page content not centered on larger screens
fields.steps: View the homepage on a large screen.
fields.expected_result: Content should be centered properly.
fields.actual_result: Content is left-aligned, creating an unbalanced layout.

fields.summary: Search feature returns no results for valid queries
fields.steps: Search for a valid product name in the search bar.
fields.expected_result: Relevant products should appear in the search results.
fields.actual_result: No results are returned even for valid queries.

fields.summary: Empty cart after logging out and logging back in
fields.steps: Add items to the cart, log out, and log back in.
fields.expected_result: Cart should contain the same items after logging back in.
fields.actual_result: The cart is empty after re-login.

fields.summary: Missing breadcrumb navigation on product pages
fields.steps: Visit any product detail page.
fields.expected_result: Breadcrumb navigation should be visible for better navigation.
fields.actual_result: No breadcrumb navigation is visible on product detail pages.

fields.summary: Broken image links on the blog page
fields.steps: Browse through the blog page.
fields.expected_result: All images should load correctly.
fields.actual_result: Several images are not loading, and broken link icons are visible.

fields.summary: Unresponsive navigation bar on mobile view
fields.steps: View the navigation bar on a mobile device.
fields.expected_result: Navigation bar should be functional and responsive.
fields.actual_result: The navigation bar is not clickable, preventing users from navigating.

fields.summary: Images not optimized for fast loading
fields.steps: Visit any image-heavy page.
fields.expected_result: Images should load efficiently and quickly.
fields.actual_result: Images take a long time to load, especially on slower connections.

fields.summary: Accessibility issues with form elements
fields.steps: Navigate through the form with a screen reader.
fields.expected_result: All form elements should be properly labeled and accessible.
fields.actual_result: Several form elements are not properly labeled, causing accessibility issues.

fields.summary: Carousel does not pause on hover
fields.steps: Hover over any item in the carousel.
fields.expected_result: Carousel should pause on hover for easier viewing.
fields.actual_result: The carousel continues to move even when hovered over.

fields.summary: Unable to apply discount code during checkout
fields.steps: Enter a valid discount code during checkout.
fields.expected_result: Discount should be applied to the total price.
fields.actual_result: The discount code is not applied, and the total price remains unchanged.

fields.summary: Time zone mismatch in order confirmation emails
fields.steps: Complete an order and check the confirmation email.
fields.expected_result: Order confirmation should show the correct time zone.
fields.actual_result: The order confirmation email shows the wrong time zone, confusing the user.
